Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: SELECT a.record,   CONCAT(   max(if(a.field_name = 'table_name', a.value, NULL)),    ' () ' ) as value  FROM redcap_data a  WHERE a.project_id=64149  GROUP BY a.record  ORDER BY value

SELECT CONCAT(a.record, '|', b.instance), CONCAT(a.value, ' | ', b.value) FROM (SELECT record,value FROM redcap_data WHERE project_id=64149 AND field_name = 'table_name') a JOIN (SELECT record, value, IFNULL(instance,1) as instance FROM redcap_data WHERE project_id=64149 AND field_name = 'variable_name') b  ON b.record=a.record ORDER BY a.value, b.instance
0, Not available | 1, Limited | 2, Some sites | 3, Most sites | 99, Unknown
